issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: Currently in PCPP, {{synchronized (curQueue)}} is used in various places. Such instances could be replaced with a read lock. Thank you [~jianhe] for pointing out the same as comment [here|https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/YARN-2009?focusedCommentId=15626578&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels:comment-tabpanel#comment-15626578]
fields.summary: ProportionalPreemptionalPolicy could use readLock over LeafQueue instead of synchronized block
